interfaces

Interface I_FileReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileIOModule

    public interface I_FileReader
    Describes the behavior of opening and reading files.
    Since:
    09/12/2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    jacob.watson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File openFile(java.lang.String filePath)
      Opens and returns the file that is located at the given filePath.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFileContents(java.io.File file)
      Opens and returns the contents of the given file.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFileContents(java.lang.String filePath)
      Opens and returns the contents of the file that is located at the given filePath.

    • Method Detail

      • openFile

        java.io.File openFile(java.lang.String filePath)
               throws FileIOException
        Opens and returns the file that is located at the given filePath.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path that leads to the desired file.
        Returns:
        Returns the file that is located at the given path.
        Throws:
        FileIOException - Thrown if there is an issue opening the file, or if the given filePath is either empty or null.

      • readFileContents

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFileContents(java.lang.String filePath)
                                           throws FileIOException
        Opens and returns the contents of the file that is located at the given filePath.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path that leads to the desired file.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Strings that contain the contents of the file that is located at the given path.
        Throws:
        FileIOException - Thrown if there is an issue opening the file, or if the given filePath is either empty or null.

      • readFileContents

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFileContents(java.io.File file)
                                           throws FileIOException
        Opens and returns the contents of the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file that needs to be read.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Strings that contain the contents of the given file.
        Throws:
        FileIOException - Thrown if there is an issue opening the file, or if the given file is null.
